subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Steroids
lead_paragraph: A sports arbitration court ruled that the Tour de France could not exclude the Astana-Würth cycling team from this year's race because of blood-doping allegations, saying there was a "lack of concrete elements" to warrant sanctions.
snippet: A sports arbitration court ruled that the Tour de France could not exclude the Astana-Würth cycling team from this year's race because of blood-doping allegations, saying there was a "lack of concrete elements" to warrant sanctions.
